LightningComponentBundle.description: Ontario Design System Date Input with separate day, month, and year fields for accessible date entry.

property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: The main label for the date input group

property.name: name
property.label: Name
property.description: The name attribute for the input (used in forms)

property.name: hintText
property.label: Hint Text
property.description: Optional hint text displayed below the label

property.name: value
property.label: Default Value
property.description: Default date value in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD)

property.name: required
property.label: Required
property.description: Whether the date input is required

property.name: disabled
property.label: Disabled
property.description: Whether the date input is disabled

property.name: minDate
property.label: Minimum Date
property.description: Minimum allowed date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD)

property.name: maxDate
property.label: Maximum Date
property.description: Maximum allowed date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD)

property.name: dayLabel
property.label: Day Label
property.description: Label for the day field (default: Day)

property.name: monthLabel
property.label: Month Label
property.description: Label for the month field (default: Month)

property.name: yearLabel
property.label: Year Label
property.description: Label for the year field (default: Year)
